Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MinuteCast widget now available. Also available, homescreen widget displaying two-day forecasts with severe weather warnings for your GPS location and a time clock. Resizable, multi-location widgets also available with even more weather detail.

You also get the accurate, local weather forecasts and customization you expect from AccuWeather:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Accurate and local forecasts for every latitude/longitude on Earth. Forecasts update every 15 minutes with information for the next 15 days Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all in 33 languages and dialects.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Current weather conditions update every 15 minutes with the very latest humidity and precipitation percentages, dew point, visibility, UV index, wind speed gusts and direction, times for sunrise and sunset, and RealFeelÃ‚Â® Ã¢â‚¬â€œ AccuWeatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exclusive weather forecasting system that analyzes multiple weather factors to determine how the local temperature actually feels.

Please note: Sunrise and sunset times are found in Daily Details which can be viewed by tapping on daily forecast. Also, AccuWeather Holo Dark and Light widgets display RealFeelÃ‚Â® and occupy only the 4x1 space
